name: lauriecrean-e2e-tests
description: End-to-end tests for lauriecrean portfolio website

scripts.test:api:health: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:api:e2e" "wait-on http://localhost:3015/health --timeout 60000 --interval 1000 --verbose && playwright test tests/health.api.spec.ts --config=playwright.dev.api.config.ts --headed"
scripts.test:api:pr-feed: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:api:e2e" "playwright test tests/pull-request-feed.api.spec.ts --config=playwright.dev.api.config.ts --headed"
scripts.test:api:pr-detail: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:api:e2e" "playwright test tests/pull-request-detail.api.spec.ts --config=playwright.dev.api.config.ts --headed"
scripts.test:web:health: to be implemented, do not test this yet
scripts.test:web:landing: to be implemented, do not test this yet
scripts.test:web:pr-feed: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:e2e" "wait-on http://localhost:3020 http://localhost:3015/health --timeout 60000 --interval 1000 --verbose && playwright test tests/features/pull-request/pull-request-feed.web.spec.ts --config=playwright.dev.web.config.ts --headed"
scripts.test:web:pr-detail: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:e2e" "wait-on http://localhost:3020 http://localhost:3015/health --timeout 60000 --interval 1000 --verbose && playwright test tests/features/pull-request/pull-request-detail.web.spec.ts --config=playwright.dev.web.config.ts --headed"
scripts.cleanup: powershell -Command "taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>$null; taskkill /F /IM playwright.exe 2>$null; echo 'Cleanup completed'"
